pma:database.name: test
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `components` ( `name` text NOT NULL, `price` float NOT NULL, `quantity` int(11) NOT NULL, `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `store` text NOT NULL, `store_ref` text NOT NULL, `manufacturer` text NOT NULL, `type` text NOT NULL, `description` text NOT NULL, `location` text NOT NULL, `label` text NOT NULL, `label_extra` text NOT NULL, `package` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=13 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;
